summary: The Federal Protective Service provides security at more than 9,000 federal facilities. We talked to stakeholders and reviewed security assessment reports from 27 facilities where FPS provided services in FY 2019. Stakeholders expressed satisfaction with many aspects of FPS's performance, including staff professionalism. However, many said FPS could provide better cost estimates for recommended security measures—and we found FPS's reports lacked certain information. For example...
title: Federal Protective Service: Better Documented Cost Estimates Could Help Stakeholders Make Security Decisions
